00044     function getAudioPlayer($playerid) {
00045         
00046         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('audioplayer')) {
00047             
00048             tslib_eidtools::connectDB();
00049             $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00050                 'uid, file',   #select
00051                 'tx_servicemgr_sermons', #from
00052                 'uid='.$playerid.' and hidden=0 and deleted=0'  #where
00053             );
00054             $res ? $audioFile = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res) : die('no fetching result');
00055             
00056             require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('audioplayer').'class.tx_audioplayer.php');
00057             $audioplayer = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_audioplayer');
00058             $audioplayer->init();
00059             $audioplayer->setOptions(array('autostart'=>true));
00060             $content = $audioplayer->getFlashPlayer($audioFile['file'], $audioFile['uid']);
00061         } else {
00062             $content = 'notloaded';
00063         }
00064         return $content;
00065     }
